p: The tests were performed between 09:00 and 12:00 h, and the panelists were placed in individual cubicles in the sensory panel room. The sensory attributes were recorded using a hedonic scale of nine points (scores ranged from 1 to 9 as follows: 1, extremely dislike to 9, extremely like) according to the AMSA standards [ 24]. The consumer panelists evaluated the following attributes: appearance, flavor and tenderness.
